mapper.insert: insert into material (id, category_id, `name`, cover, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at, intro) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update material set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, category_id, `name`, cover, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at, intro from material
